sentences.en: Both offer excellent value at around £90 for a double room.
sentences.cn: 两家的双人客房都报出了大约90英镑的超值价格。

sentences.en: Conrad Black gave an excellent party that surpassed expectations.
sentences.cn: 康拉德·布莱克举办了一次远超人们预期的精彩聚会。

sentences.en: Evelyn's excellent organisational skills were soon spotted by her employers.
sentences.cn: 伊夫琳出色的组织能力很快就被老板发现。

sentences.en: Foods that ferment quickly in the stomach are excellent natural laxatives.
sentences.cn: 能在肠胃里迅速发酵的食物是绝佳的天然通便剂。

sentences.en: He is polished, charming, articulate and an excellent negotiator.
sentences.cn: 他文雅、迷人、能言善辩，是一名优秀的谈判人。

sentences.en: His car is in excellent condition.
It is an excellent way of keeping my voice in trim.
sentences.cn: 那是保持我声线处于良好状态的极好办法。

sentences.en: It would be excellent experience for him to travel a little.
sentences.cn: 对他来说，偶尔出去旅游会是很不错的经历。

sentences.en: Large overseas-based trusts are an excellent each way bet.
sentences.cn: 大型海外基金的投资前景非常好。

sentences.en: Milk products are an excellent source of calcium and protein.
sentences.cn: 奶制品富含钙与蛋白质。

sentences.en: Second-hand computers can be excellent value.
sentences.cn: 二手计算机买得好会非常合算。

sentences.en: She has always had a high reputation for her excellent short stories.
sentences.cn: 她一直因其优秀的短篇小说享有很高的声望。

sentences.en: She says the artist's impression is an excellent likeness of her abductor.
sentences.cn: 她说这张模拟画像像极了绑架她的人。

sentences.en: The dining room has lakeside views and offers excellent cuisine.
sentences.cn: 在那家饭店用餐能欣赏到湖边景色，而且那里饭菜也是美味佳肴。

sentences.en: The regions are interconnected by an excellent highway system.
sentences.cn: 那些地区通过完善的公路系统相互连接。

sentences.en: They were thankful for the excellent goalkeeping of John Lukic.
sentences.cn: 守门员约翰·卢基奇的精彩表现让他们感到庆幸。

sentences.en: This is an excellent time for affairs of the heart.
sentences.cn: 这是谈情说爱的绝佳时机。

trans.tran_en: extremely good or of very high quality
